## Request for Proposal: Conviron Plant Growth Chambers System Controller Replacement

### Tender Description
The National Research Council of Canada (NRC) is soliciting a proposal for the replacement of 21 system controllers and associated electrical, sensors, electronics, and cabinet panels for 16 Conviron Plant Growth Chambers in our Plant Growth Facilities (PGF) in Saskatoon, SK.

### Scope of Work
The scope of work includes:

* Replacement of 21 system controllers
* Installation of new equipment
* Testing and commissioning of the system
* Provision of shop drawings for review and approval
* Warranty and maintenance services

### Essential Requirements
The proposed solution must meet the following criteria:

* The system controller must be able to communicate with the Conviron Central Management system version 8.5
* The system must maintain the original environmental performance specifications of the growth chambers
* The system must include local color display and touch screen for equipment programming, alarm, diagnostics, and data logging
* The system must include control module, power supply boards, sensors, input and output boards for lighting, temperature, and relative humidity or as needed
* The system must be ethernet communication ready and able to mirror operation remotely through connected PC

### Trade Agreements
This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)

### Notice
Suppliers who consider themselves fully qualified and available to provide the goods, services, or construction services described in this notice may submit a statement of capabilities in writing to the contact person identified in this notice on or before January 3rd, 2024 at 2:00 p.m. (EST).

### Contact Information
For inquiries and Statements of Capabilities, please contact:

Katie Homuth
Senior Contracting Officer
Finance and Procurement Services Directorate
National Research Council of Canada
Email: Katie.Homuth@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca
Phone: (343) 549-4539

### Additional Information
The estimated value of the contract is approximately $330,000.00 CAD (applicable taxes included). The period of the proposed contract is from January 19, 2024, to March 28, 2025. The system must be delivered, installed, and training completed on or before March 29, 2024. The vendor must provide a written minimum one (1) year unconditional
